document.full_text: columbus defenseman jan hejda has been suspended for two games by the nhl for delivering an elbow to the head of an opponent, the league said on saturday.
document.title: blue jackets' hejda gets two-game ban for hit to head
lines_and_colors: columbus defenseman jan hejda has been suspended for two games by the nhl for delivering an elbow to the head of an opponent, the league said on saturday.
